hibernate-mapping.query: Delete From TCMORM00052 Where Cur=:CUR and Active = true
select new TCMDTO00052 ( MAX(drpt.Id) ) from TCMORM00052 as drpt

Select new TCMDTO00052 ( D.Cur, D.ReceiptCash, D.ReceiptCashVou, D.ReceiptTransfer, D.ReceiptTransferVou, D.ReceiptClearing, D.ReceiptClearingVou, D.PaymentCash, D.PaymentCashVou, D.PaymentTransfer, D.PaymentTransferVou, D.PaymentClearing, D.PaymentClearingVou, D.DrawingCash, D.DrawingCashVou, D.DrawingTransfer, D.DrawingTransferVou, D.EncashCash, D.EncashCashVou, D.EncashTransfer, D.EncashTransferVou, D.CashInHand, D.CashWithCBM, D.ACWithOthBank, D.CurOpened, D.CurClosed, D.CurTotal, D.CurOBal, D.CurDep, D.CurWith, D.SavOpened, D.SavClosed, D.SavTotal, D.SavOBal, D.SavDep, D.SavWith, D.CalOpened, D.CalClosed, D.CalTotal, D.CalOBal, D.CalDep, D.CalWith, D.FixOpened, D.FixClosed, D.FixTotal, D.FixOBal, D.FixDep, D.FixWith, D.Date_Time, D.Active, D.CreatedDate, D.CreatedUserId, D.UpdatedDate, D.UpdatedUserId ) From TCMORM00052 as D Where D.Cur =:Cur and D.Active = true

select new TCMDTO00052 ( dlyreport.Cur, dlyreport.ReceiptCash, dlyreport.ReceiptCashVou, dlyreport.ReceiptTransfer, dlyreport.ReceiptTransferVou, dlyreport.ReceiptClearing, dlyreport.ReceiptClearingVou, dlyreport.PaymentCash, dlyreport.PaymentCashVou, dlyreport.PaymentTransfer, dlyreport.PaymentTransferVou, dlyreport.PaymentClearing, dlyreport.PaymentClearingVou, dlyreport.DrawingCash, dlyreport.DrawingCashVou, dlyreport.DrawingTransfer, dlyreport.DrawingTransferVou, dlyreport.EncashCash, dlyreport.EncashCashVou, dlyreport.EncashTransfer, dlyreport.EncashTransferVou, dlyreport.CashInHand, dlyreport.CashWithCBM, dlyreport.ACWithOthBank, dlyreport.CurOpened, dlyreport.CurClosed, dlyreport.CurTotal, dlyreport.CurOBal, dlyreport.CurDep, dlyreport.CurWith, dlyreport.SavOpened, dlyreport.SavClosed, dlyreport.SavTotal, dlyreport.SavOBal, dlyreport.SavDep, dlyreport.SavWith, dlyreport.CalOpened, dlyreport.CalClosed, dlyreport.CalTotal, dlyreport.CalOBal, dlyreport.CalDep, dlyreport.CalWith, dlyreport.FixOpened, dlyreport.FixClosed, dlyreport.FixTotal, dlyreport.FixOBal, dlyreport.FixDep, dlyreport.FixWith, dlyreport.Date_Time ) from TCMORM00052 as dlyreport where Convert(char(10),dlyreport.Date_Time,111)=:datetime and dlyreport.Cur=:cur and dlyreport.Active=true

update TCMORM00052 dlyreport set dlyreport.ReceiptCash=:receiptcash, dlyreport.ReceiptCashVou=:receiptcashvou, dlyreport.ReceiptTransfer=:receiptTran, dlyreport.ReceiptTransferVou=:receiptTranVou, dlyreport.ReceiptClearing=:receiptClearing, dlyreport.ReceiptClearingVou=:receiptClearingVou, dlyreport.PaymentCash=:paymentCash, dlyreport.PaymentCashVou=:paymentCashVou, dlyreport.PaymentTransfer=:paymentTran, dlyreport.PaymentTransferVou=:paymentTranVou, dlyreport.PaymentClearing=:paymentClearing, dlyreport.PaymentClearingVou=:paymentClearingVou, dlyreport.DrawingCash=:drawingCash, dlyreport.DrawingCashVou=:drawingCashVou, dlyreport.DrawingTransfer=:drawingTran, dlyreport.DrawingTransferVou=:drawingTanVou, dlyreport.EncashCash=:encashCash, dlyreport.EncashCashVou=:encashCashVou, dlyreport.EncashTransfer=:encashTran, dlyreport.EncashTransferVou=:encashTranVou, dlyreport.CashInHand=:cashinHand, dlyreport.CashWithCBM=:cashwithcbm, dlyreport.ACWithOthBank=:acwithothbank, dlyreport.CurOpened=:curopened, dlyreport.CurClosed=:curclosed, dlyreport.CurTotal=:curtotal, dlyreport.CurOBal=:curobal, dlyreport.CurDep=:curdep, dlyreport.CurWith=:curwith, dlyreport.SavOpened=:savopend, dlyreport.SavClosed=:saveclosed, dlyreport.SavTotal=:savetotal, dlyreport.SavOBal=:saveobal, dlyreport.SavDep=:savedep, dlyreport.SavWith=:savwith, dlyreport.CalOpened=:calopend, dlyreport.CalClosed=:calclosed, dlyreport.CalTotal=:caltotal, dlyreport.CalOBal=:calobal, dlyreport.CalDep=:caldep, dlyreport.CalWith=:calwith, dlyreport.FixOpened=:fixopened, dlyreport.FixClosed=:fixclosed, dlyreport.FixTotal=:fixtotal, dlyreport.FixOBal=:fixobal, dlyreport.FixDep=:fixdep, dlyreport.FixWith=:fixwith, dlyreport.UpdatedDate=:updateddate, dlyreport.UpdatedUserId=:updateduserId where dlyreport.Cur=:currencycode and dlyreport.Active=true
